lead_paragraph: The United States was eliminated from the Copa América yesterday when Brazil defeated Ecuador, 1-0, in Puerto la Cruz, Venezuela, after Mexico and Chile played to a 0-0 tie. The United States lost by 4-1 to Argentina and by 3-1 to Paraguay.
snippet: The United States was eliminated from the Copa América yesterday when Brazil defeated Ecuador, 1-0, in Puerto la Cruz, Venezuela, after Mexico and Chile played to a 0-0 tie. The United States lost by 4-1 to Argentina and by 3-1 to Paraguay.
